Body: He then went to see the oranges being harvested. He found out that they harvested 54 sacks of oranges.
Question: How many days did it take to harvest them if they harvested 18 sacks of oranges per day?

Body: A mailman has to give 25 pieces of junk mail to each block. If he gives 5 mails to each house in a block
Question: How many houses are there in a block?

Body: A waiter had 8 customers. After some left he still had 5 customers. Then he got 99 new customers
Question: How many customers left?

Body: Jake has 3 fewer peaches and 4 more apples than Steven. Steven has 19 apples and 15 peaches.
Question: How many more apples than peaches does Steven have?

Body: Every day Ryan spends 6 hours on learning english and 7 hours on learning chinese.
Question: How many more hours does he spend on learning chinese than he does on learning english?

Body: 4 birds and 46 storks were sitting on the fence. 6 more birds came to join them.
Question: How many birds are sitting on the fence?

Body: Paco had 28 cookies. He ate some of them and had 7 cookies left.
Question: How many cookies did Paco eat?

Body: Matthew had 8 crackers to give to friends. If Matthew gave 2 crackers to each his friends
Question: How many friends did he give crackers to?

Body: 41 campers went rowing and 4 campers went hiking in the morning. 26 campers went rowing in the afternoon.
Question: How many campers went rowing and hiking in all?

Body: Paco had 13 cookies. He ate 2 of them. Then he bought 36 more cookies
Question: How many more cookies did he buy than those he ate?
